ygData.subject: Great News!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Thursday, September 18, 2003 I knew things could only get so bad before they started to look up... Tomorrow I go in for the drug testing portion, than
ygData.messageBody:
Thursday, September 18, 2003

I knew things could only get so bad before they started to look up...

Tomorrow I go in for the drug testing portion, than orientation for
the job I am getting. Thankfully I follow rules, laws, and try to do
my best in life so no worries! The teacher/parent meeting let me know
my son was above his class. He's at the level now in the first of
three trimesters that he should be by the end of the year. Today he
brought home another award, I'm sure he has all 4 "As" so I'll owe
him $20, and he's behaving very well. With his award he gets his
picture taken and put on a local restaurants wall as well as a free
dinner.

I make it a point to frame and hang Vincent's awards and achievements
so he's driven to do his best and aime high in life. At the same time
the few times he does see his dad it helps to keep his self-esteem
high when his father does something to lower it.

We are one step closer to our family goals!! We want to buy a 4
bedroom house. My fianc├⌐ will have his own computer room, privacy,
and can do basically what he wants with his space. Vincent was
promised a dog when we get a house and I hope he keeps up with
cleaning up after it, feeding it, and making sure it has water. I on
the other hand only care about having a big kitchen with a center
island. Plus, we still have to think about our goals to get married,
the dress will probably be the highest price tag. The photographer,
video, church, flowers, his tuxedo, my son's little tuxedo, and
plenty food.


Don't Quit

When things go wrong and they sometimes will,
When the road you're trudging seems all uphill,
When funds are low and debts are high,
And you want to smile but only sigh,
When care is pressing you down a bit,
Rest if you must, but don't you quit.

Life is strange with its twists and turns,
As every one of us sometimes learns,
And many a failure turns about,
When he might have won had he stuck it out,
Don't give up though the pace seems slow,
You may succeed with another blow.

Success is failure turned inside out,
The silver tint of the clouds of doubt,
And you can never tell how close you are,
It seems so near when it seems so far;
So stick to the fight when hardest hit,
It's when things go wrong that you must not quit.
_________________
~*~Beverly R.~*~
P.O. Box 15192
Sacramento, CA 95813
"Before we can break free from what binds us we must first realize we
are locked up".
http://beverlys_family.tripod.com
http://beverlys_deadbeat.tripod.com
